BT BROADBAND AVAILABILITY CHECKER

Welcome to the Broadband Availability checker. This will provide a provisional check of your ability to receive reliable Broadband services.

We cannot find an exact match for your address, please select an address from the list below. If your address does not appear in the list please go back and amend your details.



For the checker responses to be valid you must enter an accurate address. If you enter just a postcode we will return a list of premises for you to choose from. You will need a BT phone line to obtain service.

If you are unable to provide or match your address, please select the
Telephone Number Checker

or the

Postcode Checker

By submitting a query into this checker you accept Terms of Use for this checker.
